ord Petric Amber was a wood elven patriar of Baldurs Gate and a member of the Parliament of Peers in the late 15 century DR.
Petric Amber was a wood elven man with sharp facial features and a skin tone tinted with floral green-brown. He had long brown hair and wore a monocle over his right eye. He preferred blue finery and wore a resplendent hat decorated with a single massive feather.
In the , shortly before the armies of the Cult of the Absolute attacked the city of Baldurs Gate, Lord Petric Amber was a Parliamentarian of the Gate who voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord Enver Gortash as the citys Archduke. Lord Amber was present for Gortashs coronation that took place in the audience hall of Wyrms Rock. Following the coronation, Petric stated that he would support the new Archduke as long as Gortash honored the agreement between them.
